title: How does Essence Reaver interact with skills and items?

replies.body:
It works exactly like Lifesteal would work:

* Mystic Shot, Parrrley, Double Up, and Hurricane all work
* Bonus damage from Critical Strikes works. I believe Sheen/Trinity Force also.
* Empower, Ruined King, etc all do not vamp.
* Anything that amplifies your champion's actual AD stat (like Janna shield) works, whereas Nami's buff would not.

I'm actually unsure about Ravenous Hydra. I could see it either way, but I am guessing it would not vamp anything from the splash damage, either passive or active.
Oh! Could this be a great item for Ezreal maybe? What other champions did you have in mind when designing this item?

Ezreal is okay with the item.  Some people are trying blue build again with him with ER replacing elder lizard.

It's good on Ashe, Sivir, and maybe Varus for ADCs.  I need to try it on MF who I think would like it.  Vayne might like it only if it helps her Q more.  Caits like to get it if they get hurricane so they can Q more as well.

Poppy likes it, and I think Jax, top Vi, and Irelia would too.  It'd probably be good on a top champ who needs to lane against a manaless champ.

It's also a good item for AD casters: CDR on AD champs is hard to build for.  This, 5% mastery, black cleaver, and Ionian boots means you've got 40%.

Okay, it working like lifesteal seems fair as an effect.  

Thank you for answering Phreak.

Although it's severely cost inefficient mid-late game and basically a noob trap, it may be good on ezreal since his Q applies it. It applies similarly to lifesteal and works with on-hit effects i believe.

The cost is fine, the issue with the item is not everyone needs it and some people who could use it have other priorities.

It's not a noob-trab, it's situational.

The only person I see it being in any way decent on is Yi, since his Q is 100 mana each. With this, he could split push even harder without going OOM. That's about it though. Otherwise, a very lackluster item. Give it a minor item with that passive, building into Essence Reaver, sure. As was pointed out by a previous poster, though, is that you need mana regen early game, but by mid-late, most every champion just stops having mana issues.
Okay, I just did a test and it appears to work with hurricane.  This is interesting.
